template: return sign * __ if INT_MIN <= sign * __ <= INT_MAX else INT_MAX
template_origin: return sign * tot if INT_MIN <= sign * tot <= INT_MAX else INT_MAX

return sign * y if INT_MIN <= sign * y <: return (sign * y >= INT_MIN && sign * y <= INT_MAX) ? sign * y : INT_MAX;
return sign * a if INT_MIN <= sign * a <: return (sign * a >= INT_MIN && sign * a <= INT_MAX) ? sign * a : INT_MAX;
